CustomField.formula: IF( or( ( (OB_Archiver__Failed__c > 0) && NOT(ISBLANK(OB_Archiver__EndedAt__c)) && OB_Archiver__EndedAt__c > DATETIMEVALUE("2021-04-01 12:00:00") && or(ISPICKVAL( OB_Archiver__Type__c , "Archive"), ISPICKVAL( OB_Archiver__Type__c , "Purge")) ), ((OB_Archiver__Failed__c = 0) && OB_Archiver__Succeeded__c =0 && OR(OB_Archiver__Total_Skipped_Root_Records__c =0,ISBLANK(OB_Archiver__Total_Skipped_Root_Records__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(OB_Archiver__EndedAt__c)) && or(ISPICKVAL( OB_Archiver__Type__c , "Archive"))), OB_Archiver__Status__c='Ended With Errors' ), IF(ISBLANK($CustomMetadata.01IWR0000022RFz.m2YWR000008f1V2.NamespacePrefix), HYPERLINK("/apex/OwnBackup_LogsASCSVFileVF?requestId=" &OB_Archiver__RequestId__c &"&reportType=" &TEXT(OB_Archiver__Type__c) &"&policyId=" &OB_Archiver__PolicyId__r.Id &"&logsType=" &"error" &"&sobjectName=" & OB_Archiver__SObjectName__c ,"Download File"), HYPERLINK("/apex/OB_Archiver__OwnBackup_LogsASCSVFileVF?requestId=" &OB_Archiver__RequestId__c &"&reportType=" &TEXT(OB_Archiver__Type__c) &"&logsType=" &"error" &"&policyId=" &OB_Archiver__PolicyId__r.Id &"&sobjectName=" & OB_Archiver__SObjectName__c,"Download File")), '')
CustomField.label: Failed Records
